sections.text: The Vanderbilt MPH prepares leaders to improve population health through evidence‑based practice, policy, and research.

items: Core in biostatistics, epidemiology, health policy
sections.text: Students complete public health core coursework, electives by concentration, and applied practicum and capstone experiences.

items: Application with transcripts and personal statement
sections.text: Applicants must hold a bachelor’s degree; experience in health or related fields is recommended but not required.
Graduates work in public health practice, research, government, and NGOs.
